results.description: Borussia Dortmund score two late goals to beat Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga and leapfrog Bayern Munich, who drew at Freiburg, at the top of the table.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund back on top as Bayern stumble
results.title: Bundesliga: Borussia Dortmund take top spot as Bayern Munich stumble

results.description: Bayern Munich go top of the Bundesliga for the first time since September by thrashing Wolfsburg 6-0.
results.shortTitle: Bayern top for first time since September
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-0 Wolfsburg: Champions top for first time since September

results.description: Borussia Dortmund remain unbeaten at the top of the Bundesliga, with England winger Jadon Sancho playing a key role in their goal.
results.title: Jadon Sancho plays key role in Borussia Dortmund goal; Reiss Nelson scores

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores twice as Bayern Munich end their four-game winless run with victory at Wolfsburg.
results.shortTitle: Lewandowski helps Bayern end winless run
results.title: Wolfsburg 1-3 Bayern Munich: Robert Lewandowski helps champions end winless run

results.description: As the Women's Champions League returns, England's Mary Earps tells BBC Sport about her journey from West Bridgford Colts to European finalists Wolfsburg.
results.shortTitle: The penalty save that led Earps to the European finalists
results.title: Mary Earps: Women's Champions League finalists Wolfsburg's new ex-West Bridgford Colts star

results.description: Belgium's record goalscorer Tessa Wullaert signs for Women's Super League Manchester City on a two-year deal from Wolfsburg.
results.shortTitle: Man City sign Belgium striker Wullaert
results.title: Tessa Wullaert: Manchester City Women sign Belgium's record scorer

results.description: Reading and England goalkeeper Mary Earps joins Women's Champions League finalists Wolfsburg.
results.shortTitle: Reading keeper Earps to join Wolfsburg
results.title: Mary Earps: Wolfsburg sign England and Reading goalkeeper

results.description: Lyon claim a third straight Women's Champions League title as they fight back to beat 10-player Wolfsburg in extra time.
results.title: Women's Champions League final: Wolfsburg Ladies 1-4 Lyon Feminines (AET)

altText: England's Lucy Bronze won her first Champions League title after joining Lyon last summer

results.description: Wolfsburg keep their place in the Bundesliga after beating Holstein Kiel in a promotion-relegation play-off.
results.title: Holstein Kiel 0-1 VfL Wolfsburg (1-4 agg)

results.description: Everton forward Ademola Lookman scores for RB Leipzig while England youth international Jadon Sancho sets up a goal for Borussia Dortmund.
results.title: RB Leipzig 4-1 Wolfsburg

results.description: Chelsea concede three away goals on their way to defeat by Wolfsburg in the first leg of their Women's Champions League semi-final.
results.title: Women's Champions League: Chelsea Ladies 1-3 VfL Wolfsburg

results.description: Martin Schmidt resigns as manager of Wolfsburg just five months after replacing ex-Arsenal academy boss Andries Jonker.
results.title: Wolfsburg: Martin Schmidt resigns after six months as manager

results.description: Robert Lewandowski's last-minute penalty gives Bayern Munich a 13th victory in a row as they beat Wolfsburg to go 21 points clear.
results.title: Wolfsburg 1-2 Bayern Munich

results.description: Borussia Dortmund leave Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang out of their squad for the second time this season for "disciplinary reasons".
results.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang: Borussia Dortmund striker dropped for missing meeting

results.description: Germany striker Mario Gomez joins Stuttgart from Wolfsburg and hopes he can break into the World Cup squad.
results.title: Mario Gomez: Stuttgart sign Germany striker from Wolfsburg

results.description: Liverpool striker Divock Origi, on loan at German club Wolfsburg, misses an open goal from just a few yards out against RB Leipzig in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Divock Origi misses open goal for Wolfsburg

results.description: Bayern Munich blew a two-goal lead as they were held by Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Bayern Munich 2-2 Wolfsburg

results.description: Follow live text coverage as Bayern Munich face Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Bundesliga: Bayern Munich v Wolfsburg

results.description: Liverpool complete the £35m signing of England midfielder Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain from Arsenal on a five-year deal.
results.title: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain: Liverpool sign Arsenal midfielder for £35m
